name: Flag-a-duck
description:
Flag-a-duck is a RTS in which the player leads its units by using Flag Semaphore (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_semaphore).

The challenge relies on switching between the view of the battlefield and the camp where you can manipulate the flag and thus gives order.

  • Music: Military March from Schubert.
  • Game realized during the Castle Game Jam 2016.
